medical_history.chief_complaint: Multiple vesicles in a linear distribution on the calf.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The vesicles were noticed by the mother at 5 days of age and gradually disappeared, leaving residual hyperpigmentation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Incontinentia pigmenti (MIM 308310) and low-grade XXY mosaicism.
medical_history.family_history: There was no family history of multiple miscarriages or reported signs of incontinentia pigmenti in other family members.
